# open-fdd — LLM Entrypoint

Config-driven FDD (Fault Detection and Diagnostics) for HVAC. YAML rules, pandas DataFrames, optional Brick.

## Start here

- **Agent contract:** AGENTS.md
- **API reference:** docs/api_reference.md
- **Rule cookbook:** docs/expression_rule_cookbook.md
- **Knowledge map:** docs/knowledge-map.md
- **DataFrame contract:** docs/dataframe-contract.md
- **Config schema:** docs/config_schema.md
- **Agent guide:** docs/ai_agents.md

## Examples

- examples/run_all_rules_brick.py — Brick workflow
- examples/validate_data_model.py — Pre-run validation
- examples/brick_fault_viz/ — Fault visualization notebook

## Source

- open_fdd/ — Library; read docstrings for API ground truth
